20101213140247.667|20101213140251.000|TR0|and the people behind them

20101213140256.000|20101213140301.000|TR0|were the actions aimed at
20101213140301.000|20101213140306.000|TR0|fuelling hatred and hostility
20101213140306.000|20101213140311.000|TR0|based on racial, national or
20101213140311.000|20101213140314.333|TR0|religous differences. Such
20101213140314.333|20101213140317.667|TR0|actions are a threat to the

20101213140321.000|20101213140326.000|TR0|such actions police CAN and MUST

20101213140806.000|20101213140811.000|TR0|not report on dealers - realize

20101213140814.333|20101213140817.667|TR0|their mouths. Let them consider
20101213140817.667|20101213140821.000|TR0|which is better: with BEEP in
20101213140821.000|20101213140826.000|TR0|their mouths or without.
20101213140826.000|20101213140831.000|TR0|[[terrifying pics of addicts]]
20101213140831.000|20101213140836.000|TR0|Every year more than one hundred
20101213140836.000|20101213140841.000|TR0|thousand people officially die
20101213140841.000|20101213140844.333|TR0|in Russia from overdose or drug

20101213140847.667|20101213140851.000|TR0|include suicides  [[pix of door
20101213140851.000|20101213140856.000|TR0|opening]] Psychiatrist Olga
20101213140856.000|20101213140901.000|TR0|Knyazeva believes people would
20101213140901.000|20101213140904.333|TR0|better opening their eyes to the
20101213140904.333|20101213140907.667|TR0|scale of the problem, rather

20101213140931.000|20101213140934.333|TR0|lets keep silent about
20101213140934.333|20101213140937.667|TR0|everything. Well keep our
20101213140937.667|20101213140941.000|TR0|mouths shut about all the issues
20101213140941.000|20101213140946.000|TR0|and live on. Let 20-year-old
20101213140946.000|20101213140951.000|TR0|young men die, and millions and
20101213140951.000|20101213140956.000|TR0|billions of dollars flood into
20101213140956.000|20101213141001.000|TR0|drug dealers pockets pretending
20101213141001.000|20101213141004.333|TR0|that everything is perfect in
20101213141004.333|20101213141007.667|TR0|our society! Olga says behind
20101213141007.667|20101213141011.000|TR0|the fact that the anti-drug
20101213141011.000|20101213141016.000|TR0|advert is getting more primitive
20101213141016.000|20101213141021.000|TR0|is another shocking reality: the
20101213141021.000|20101213141024.333|TR0|targeting audience is getting
20101213141024.333|20101213141027.667|TR0|younger and younger. The average
20101213141027.667|20101213141031.000|TR0|age when youngsters in Russia
20101213141031.000|20101213141036.000|TR0|first try drugs has dropped to
20101213141036.000|20101213141041.000|TR0|13 years, with an addicts
20101213141041.000|20101213141046.000|TR0|average life expectancy, just
20101213141046.000|20101213141051.000|TR0|21. [[sb Olga Knyazeva]] DRAFT
20101213141051.000|20101213141054.333|TR0|This is for them, so it has to
20101213141054.333|20101213141057.667|TR0|be primitive to work, if you
20101213141057.667|20101213141101.000|TR0|wish. Do you think they dont
20101213141101.000|20101213141106.000|TR0|know this is bad? But they need
20101213141106.000|20101213141111.000|TR0|to literally be imprinted in
20101213141111.000|20101213141116.000|TR0|their minds. The shocking
20101213141116.000|20101213141121.000|TR0|campaign is actually a
20101213141121.000|20101213141124.333|TR0|government initiative, a
20101213141124.333|20101213141127.667|TR0|response to the countrys new
20101213141127.667|20101213141131.000|TR0|priority in fighting the drug
20101213141131.000|20101213141136.000|TR0|problem. [[sb Victor Ivanov
20101213141136.000|20101213141141.000|TR0|Russian Federal Drug Control
20101213141141.000|20101213141144.333|TR0|Service - moscow]] Weve always
20101213141144.333|20101213141147.667|TR0|been concentrated on finding
20101213141147.667|20101213141151.000|TR0|drugs and withdraw them. This
20101213141151.000|20101213141156.000|TR0|July we adopted a new state drug
20101213141156.000|20101213141201.000|TR0|strategy - now we need to focus
20101213141201.000|20101213141206.000|TR0|on decreasing demand rather than
20101213141206.000|20101213141211.000|TR0|try to cope with the
20101213141211.000|20101213141214.333|TR0|consequences. [[st up - moscow]]
20101213141214.333|20101213141217.667|TR0|Russia used to spend about 50
20101213141217.667|20101213141221.000|TR0|million dollars on anti-drug

20101213141226.000|20101213141231.000|TR0|figure in the US, for instance,

20101213141241.000|20101213141244.333|TR0|FIGURES]] With the governments

20101213141251.000|20101213141256.000|TR0|more projects like this one -

20101213141726.000|20101213141731.000|TR0|The new government will face a
20101213141731.000|20101213141736.000|TR0|number of challenges including a
20101213141736.000|20101213141741.000|TR0|weak economy, extremely high
20101213141741.000|20101213141744.333|TR0|unemployment and endemic

20101213141747.667|20101213141751.000|TR0|deeply divided along ethnic
20101213141751.000|20101213141756.000|TR0|lines, with the majority of its
20101213141756.000|20101213141801.000|TR0|ethnic Serb population
20101213141801.000|20101213141804.333|TR0|boycotting the poll. Serbia
20101213141804.333|20101213141807.667|TR0|refuses to recognise Kosovo's
20101213141807.667|20101213141811.000|TR0|independence. And we can now

20101213141834.333|20101213141837.667|TR0|The White House says the U.S.
20101213141837.667|20101213141841.000|TR0|Senate will ratify the key
20101213141841.000|20101213141846.000|TR0|nuclear arms treaty with Russia
20101213141846.000|20101213141851.000|TR0|before the New Year. Following
20101213141851.000|20101213141856.000|TR0|the announcement that two
20101213141856.000|20101213141901.000|TR0|Republican senators are backing
20101213141901.000|20101213141904.333|TR0|the deal, its supporters have
20101213141904.333|20101213141907.667|TR0|enough votes required for
20101213141907.667|20101213141911.000|TR0|ratification.
20101213141911.000|20101213141916.000|TR0|
20101213141916.000|20101213141921.000|TR0|Back in April, Presidents Dmitry
20101213141921.000|20101213141924.333|TR0|Medvedev and Barack Obama signed
20101213141924.333|20101213141927.667|TR0|the new START treaty that would
20101213141927.667|20101213141931.000|TR0|slash the two countries'
20101213141931.000|20101213141936.000|TR0|strategic nuclear stockpiles by
20101213141936.000|20101213141941.000|TR0|a third. The deal needs to be
20101213141941.000|20101213141946.000|TR0|ratified in both countries, but
20101213141946.000|20101213141951.000|TR0|there has been vocal opposition
